page.title: 08WEST HILL PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: There are four classes at this school. The main building was built in 1876.We start school at 9.00am and finish at 3.30pm.In class one there are the reception infants and the middle infants.In class two there are the top infants and the first year juniors.In class three there are the older first years and the second year juniors.In class four there are the third and forth year juniors. The teachers are: class 1 Mrs.W.Sims class 2 Miss.G.Murch class 3 Mrs.S.Molland class 4 Mr.G.Nicholson On Tuesdays two classes take it in turns to go swimming at the Salston Hotel (Ottery St.Mary).After school we have different clubs.We sometimes have
